item.description:
By Request: June 7th Jessica is doing the Bikes not Bombs bikeathon - it's a 15 or
25 mile ride from JP down to the Blue Hills Reservation. The ride ends up at the Green Roots Festival.

Check it out!
http://www.bikesnotbo...

This could be a fun event for the group. We could register as a team. There are some fees ($20 to register per person) and fundraising ($150 for the group).

Jessica will be the lead on this event

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Bikes not Bombs Bikeathon -JP to the Blue Hills Res. Ends w/Green Roots Fest
